== A Hardy Party! ==

In celebration of the release of Ubuntu 8.04 (Hardy Heron), the Indiana Ubuntu Local Community team will have a '''Hardy Release Party''' from '''Noon until 8:04 PM''' on '''Saturday, April 26, 2008''' at the '''Reddick Shelterhouse''' at '''Fort Harrison State Park in Indianapolis'''.

The shelter house has been reserved from 7:00 AM until 8:30 PM - you're welcome to show up early to help set up.

Fort Harrison State Park is a day use park and '''we must exit the park prior to the gate's closing at 8:30 PM'''.  The park entrance is located at Post Road and East 59th Street on Indianapolis' East side.  '''There is a $5 entrance fee per car''' with Indiana license plates (your receipt gives you in and out privileges for the day).

<nowiki>[[http://www.in.gov/dnr/parklake/properties/maps/2007/ftharrison_trail.pdf|Park Map and Brochure]]</nowiki>

Please RSVP by adding your name to the chart below so we know how much food is needed.

=== Park Rules ===
* Dogs and cats must be on leashes less than 6 feet long and attended to at all times
* All trash must be removed from the shelter per the Carry In/Carry Out policy
* Refer to the <nowiki>[[http://www.in.gov/dnr/parklake/properties/maps/2007/ftharrison_trail.pdf|Park Brochure]]</nowiki> for additional rules
 

=== Shelter Amenities ===
* 27 picnic tables
* Charcoal grill
* Fireplace
* 4 electrical outlets

=== Stuff to bring ===

* Charcoal
* Lighter fluid
* Food
* Soft Drinks (limited quantities of alcohol are also allowed per park rules)
* Trash bags
* Coolers
* Ice
